title: Investigate RDP resize reconnection speed improvements
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
When resizing an RDP connection due to the connection window size changing, it sometimes takes a while to reconnect, even though a manual disconnect / reconnect would complete fairly quickly. Look into replacing the `msRdpClient8.Reconnect()` call with a manual disconnect / reconnect to see if it is more reliable.

## Expected Behavior
Reconnecting to an RDP session for a resize operation should complete in a reasonable amount of time.

## Current Behavior
Sometimes reconnecting to an RDP ...

iterations.description: Resize logic includes a 300ms debounce and potentially slow fallback to Reconnect() which can be optimized.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Resize logic includes a 300ms debounce and potentially slow fallback to Reconnect() which can be optimized.
Approach: Analyze RdpProtocol8.cs to potentially lower the 300ms resize debounce. Investigate RdpProtocol9.cs to ensure UpdateSessionDisplaySettings is used correctly and minimize fallbacks to the slower Reconnect() method.
